verses.text: O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, to whom \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* belongeth; O \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, to whom \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* belongeth, \w shew|strong="H3313"\w* thyself.\f + \fr 94.1 \ft God…: Heb. God of revenges\f*\f + \fr 94.1 \ft shew…: Heb. shine forth\f*
Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thyself, thou \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w render|strong="H7725"\w* a \w reward|strong="H1576"\w* to the \w proud|strong="H1343"\w*.
\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, how long shall the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, how long shall the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w triumph|strong="H5937"\w*?

\add How long\add* shall they \w utter|strong="H5042"\w* \add and\add* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* hard \w things|strong="H6277"\w*? \add and\add* all the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* \w boast|strong="H0559"\w* themselves?
They break in \w pieces|strong="H1792"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* thine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*.
They \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* and the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, and \w murder|strong="H7523"\w* the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*.

Yet they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd* shall not \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, neither shall the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w regard|strong="H0995"\w* \add it\add*.
\w Understand|strong="H0995"\w*, ye \w brutish|strong="H1197"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and \add ye\add* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*, when will ye be \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*?

He that \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* the \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, shall he not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*? he that \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* the \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, shall he not \w see|strong="H5027"\w*?

He that \w chastiseth|strong="H3256"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, shall not he \w correct|strong="H3198"\w*? he that \w teacheth|strong="H3925"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, \add shall not he know\add*?
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, that they \add are\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* whom thou \w chastenest|strong="H3256"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*, and \w teachest|strong="H3925"\w* him out of thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*;

That thou mayest give him \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* from the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w adversity|strong="H7451"\w*, until the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w* be \w digged|strong="H3738"\w* for the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.
For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will not cast \w off|strong="H5203"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, neither will he \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

But \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: and all the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* it.\f + \fr 94.15 \ft shall follow…: Heb. shall be after it\f*

Who will rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* for me against the \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w*? \add or\add* who will stand \w up|strong="H3320"\w* for me against the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*?

\w Unless|strong="H3884"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add had been\add* my \w help|strong="H5833"\w*, my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* had \w almost|strong="H4592"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* in \w silence|strong="H1745"\w*.\f + \fr 94.17 \ft almost: or, quickly\f*
When I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w slippeth|strong="H4131"\w*; thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, held me \w up|strong="H5582"\w*.
In the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of my \w thoughts|strong="H8312"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* me thy \w comforts|strong="H8575"\w* \w delight|strong="H8173"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

Shall the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H1942"\w* have \w fellowship|strong="H2266"\w* with thee, which \w frameth|strong="H3335"\w* \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w* by a \w law|strong="H2706"\w*?

They gather themselves \w together|strong="H1413"\w* against the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, and \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* the \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.
But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is my \w defence|strong="H4869"\w*; and my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of my \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*.

And he shall \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* upon them their own \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, and shall cut them \w off|strong="H6789"\w* in their own \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*; \add yea\add*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall cut them \w off|strong="H6789"\w*.
